activities: Traxo, through its web-based or mobile application, offers a tool that allows travelers and corporations organize and manage upcoming travel plans and loyalty account information.  Each individual would explicitly opt in and provide Traxo with access to their emails or accounts so that Traxo may organize this travel information for them.  Traxo may then use this personal information of European travelers to provide those travelers with the ability to integrate all of their trip-related information into one location, share information regarding their trips, and receive informational updates and deals related to their trips.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data about European travelers processed through Traxo's web-based or mobile application .
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution, a division of the American Arbitration Association, Safe Harbor Program (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
